Keywords: Brotherhood of Mutants , Celebrity , Deadpool Corps , Warp World , Weapon X , X-Force , X-Men , X-Statix
Real Name: Doopool
Special Powers
HEY! YOU CAN'T LEAVE YET, THE FUN JUST STARTED!: Running Shot. // Opposing characters within range can't be placed.
DON'T WORRY...I KNOW WHAT I'M DOING...I THINK!: Penetrating/Psychic Blast. POWER: Unequip all opposing characters within range.
HAHA! STOP! THAT TICKLES!: STOP. Impervious. // Opposing characters within range can't deal penetrating damage.
TWO STOP CLICKS IN A ROW??? REAL ORIGINAL...: STOP. Probability Control. // When this click is first revealed, Doopool can't be healed for the rest of the game. // Opposing characters within range can't use STOP.

vamroc
[quote]I dont think he's that good for 75pts. Your opponent is likely just going to ignore him on click 1. With only 1 damage he is hardly a threat. Now he might be a good meta piece for his ability to stop retaliators and to remove equips so i can see him on the sideline possibly. Also he can be used as mastermind fodder to get to click 3-4. Still though, all his effects are very situational. [/quote] I see him as part of a lock down team No TK We've now got a character that grants Battle Fury to characters within range So, No RANGE, No PLACEMENT, imposed on a team that's built for "Run & Gun" is gonna be frustrating in the meta

August 12, 2021
Goop
I dont think he's that good for 75pts. Your opponent is likely just going to ignore him on click 1. With only 1 damage he is hardly a threat. Now he might be a good meta piece for his ability to stop retaliators and to remove equips so i can see him on the sideline possibly. Also he can be used as mastermind fodder to get to click 3-4. Still though, all his effects are very situational.
